body.name: it luggage World's Lightest New York Softside 8 Wheel Spinner, Purple Pennant, Carry-On 22-Inch
features: Exterior Dimensions: 22 x 14 x 9 inches, interior Dimensions: 18.7 x 13 x 9 inches, weight: 4.07lbs
Fiberglass frame provides a lightweight yet durable structure
The exterior features 2 zip pockets, while the interior features 1 large zip mesh pocket and 2 tie-down straps
body.description: It luggage's best-selling world's lightest range continues to evolve and reinvent itself. This iconic collection keeps its strong design DNA, while adding enhanced features such as an 8 wheel rolling system, elegant colors, optimized volumes, and extra protection. The IT Luggage world's lightest is constructed from high density polyester fabric and features a durable fiberglass frame with a sturdy locking handle system made from a single piece of aluminum. Available in a range of colors to suit your personal sense of style, this all-inclusive spinner rolling carry-on offers style and storage while its featherweight design lets you travel with ease.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Purple Pennant shown it captures every journey Designed in London it luggage World's Lightest 8 Wheel Spinner Collection Our globally sold World's Lightest Collection continues to live up to its name! Don't worry about those airline weight restrictions with this collection! Its combination of an exceptionally lightweight frame, abrasion resistant fabric and features make for a very functional, simple, and high quality luggage that's a perfect mate wherever your next journey lands you. TOUGH FIBERGLASS FRAME - Exceptionally lightweight frame is deceptively strong and built to last HIGH-TENSILE FABRIC - Durable, lightweight material resists abrasion and prolongs use FLAT PACKING INTERIOR - "No Pipes" means more space and keeps clothing crease-free SUPERIOR WHEEL CONTROL - Constant design and testing ensures the performance of our wheels lead the industry 31.5" Checked Bag - Exterior Dimensions (including wheels): 31.5 x 18.3 x 10.2 inches - Interior Dimensions: 28 x 17.9 x 10.2 inches - Weight: 5.29 lbs.s 27.6" Checked Bag: Exterior Dimensions (including wheels): 27.6 x 16.1 x 10.2 inches - Interior Dimensions: 24 x 15.9 x 9 inches - Weight: 4.51 lbs. 22" Carry-On Bag: Exterior Dimensions: 22 x 14 x 9 inches, interior Dimensions: 18.7 x 13 x 9 inches, weight: 4.07 lbs
Key Features Wide Handle Design S360 - Blue Ashes shown Wheels S561 - Magnet shown Exterior Front Pockets S392 - Raven shown Fully Lined Interior S492 - Evening Blue shown

About it lugage it luggage has become recognized throughout the world for offering exceptional value, modern design and excellent quality. Established in 1985, for over 30 years we've focused on designing luggage products that meet the travel needs of global consumers with features that make traveling easier, more secure and bags more fun. Designed in London, from our lightweight, versatile, high capacity softside cases to our aspirational, hardside cases, we build solutions for every taste and every need. it captures every journey...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value, very light weight
reviews.reviewText: Extremely light and maneuverable, and therefore a little rickety especially while dragging it over cobblestones in Italy— what a wonderful problem to have! Handle is a bit too widely spaced and I was unable to slip my smaller bag over the handle as the pocket was designed for the more standard, narrower span. It would’ve been so much easier if I could have stacked those bags. Would’ve given 5 stars for that capability. Good news is it is the perfect carry on and easily fit in overhead bins on plane and trains.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight and great value
reviews.reviewText: My last carry-on was less than 4 lb in weight, so I've been looking for one that's also light in weight. This is it. I feel the bag is very easy to roll on pavements, not to mention indoors. It's also easy enough to lift to the overhead compartment on airplanes for someone like me without lots of muscles on the arms.The only potential improvement I can suggest to the manufacturer is to make the lock-in mechanism in the handle more secure. I'm petite so it fits me better when the handle is extended half way, but then in that position the handle tends to slide down. It doesn't affect the overall functionality, though.Overall, I'm happy with this purchase and would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Spacious light weight piece.
reviews.reviewText: This luggage worked great for a week long trip from the US to UK in winter so needed to pack bulky winter clothes and shoes. It’s as light as can be and seemed to hold up well. I carried it all around the underground in London with ease. Some people complain about few pockets but pockets would clearly add weight to the piece. I just used packing cubes and it worked great. The only thing that was inconvenient was the pull up handle is too wide to hang my carry-on bag on, which has a sleeve to slide over a piece of luggage - I understand it’s designed this way to maximize space inside the luggage, it’s not a deal breaker but wasn’t the most convenient. I’ll need to look for a hook of some sort to be able to hook on my over the shoulder carry-on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I knew I dis well!
reviews.reviewText: As soon as I got this suitcase, i knew i needed one size bigger so I can have the colection. All I can say is WOW WOW WOW, great suitcase, the weight is amazing, and sooooo much storage, just wish their availability for the 3 suitcases would be available, since im ready to throw away my bulky samsonite and become a It Luggage ONLY carrier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect carryon luggage
reviews.reviewText: This is a great little suitcase that's easy to maneuver. The zippers are sturdy. The handle doesn't inspire a good deal of confidence in me, but it has held up well so far without problems. I was using it as a carryon and it meets the industry standards (pre-COVID). I can fit enough for almost a week in it without problem. Highly recommended as an easy piece of luggage for most needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2019
reviews.reviewText: These are the worst.Let me try to provide a balanced review, as much as possible:Pros-they are lightweight-the wheels glide with little to no resistanceCons- the luggage is one large compartment so everything is stuffed into a deep space that makes it difficult to separate items like clothes from food-when the luggage is packed the top zippered flap buckels in making it difficult to close-because the handles are wide, my bags do not fit through them and are instead placed gingerly on top, which creates an issue with the next two points below-because they are so lightweight the wheels wobble every which way when I am walking with the stupid things. They don’t go straight and I keep walking into them or tripping over them. I have to place a lot of effort to maneuver them. Not an easy thing to do when running around a crowded airport with two pieces of luggage that weigh 50 lbs that roll all over the place and not in unison- again, because they are so light plus their wheel placement, these stupid things fall over all. the. time. These stupid things do not stay standing upright. Ever. So in an airport while I am running around they wobble into me, into each other. And they keep falling overI hate them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good item for the money
reviews.reviewText: not as sturdy as i would of wanted it but nice for the money. The wheels are not as strong as they should be felt if i was not careful they could brake. the color was nice and style , just would of wanted sturdier but good buy for the money and saved me on weight

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Limited protection of contents
reviews.reviewText: This case is lightweight and reasonably maneuverable. One side has some pockets which protect the interior content. The other side is just thin fabric. Things inside the case shift and cause the back of the case to bulge. With a large space between the arms of the extendable handle, lots of things can stick out of the back. Those things are not protected from damage. I filled the case with my SCUBA regulator and underwater camera equipment. These things need to be protected from damage. Only the most careful handling would allow them to travel undamaged in this case.
Absolutely the lightest luggage I have ever bought!! I purchased 2 suitcases, one in pink for me and one in blue for my husband.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 2, 2020

reviews.reviewText: il principale merito di questi trolley è la leggerezza.Le ho prese sul wharehouse quindi a prezzo più basso (a fronte dell'assenza dell'imballo originale), e in questo caso le considero un buon acquisto. A prezzo "pieno" non sarei stato affatto soddisfatto.Per tenere il peso basso hanno dovuto utilizzare un materiale sottile, che spero non si laceri con i maltrattamenti che i trolley subiscono negli aeroporti.Si sente la mancanza di un appiglio vicino alle ruote, utile quando si deve riporre il trolley sul portabagagli dei treni o anche semplicemente in macchina (servono due appigli per poter prendere la valigia, piena, e riporla). Alcuni marchi, come AmazonBasics per esempio, hanno una vera e propria maniglia anche sotto.

reviews.reviewTitle: grande valise légère par son poids
reviews.reviewText: Arrivée rapidement, très bien emballée, très belle couleur, très bon produit, grande et légère, comme je voulais pour aller en cure ou mettre en voiture, je ne fais pas de voyage en avion.
C 'est ok la valise, solide et léger sauf les roules sont trop lises
